name: Arsenal Rain
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
A storm of assorted melee weapons rains down in a 30 foot radius, centered on target point within range. Creatures inside must make a Dexterity saving throw or take 10d10 damage, halved on a success. This damage is slashing, piercing, or bludgeoning damage, chosen for each creature affected. They remain embedded for the duration of the spell.

While you are in this area, you can pull out any weapon you choose from the ground and make an attack with it once per turn for 0 AP. On a successful hit, roll the weapon's damage dice an additional time.
